Desc.entry: A registered care home providing a personal care needs service for 8 young adults with substantial physical, sensory and learning disabilities. The scheme supports 8 young adults and is operated by United Health Ltd. The home also has a hydrotherapy pool which is available for private hire. This care home is registered and inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC), to make sure they provide a quality service.

category.entry: LEARNING DISABILITIES - ORGANISATIONS FOR PEOPLE WITH
